name: UtilityInsecurityGoals
title: Utility Insecurity Goals
description: There are currently no existing domain specific LOINC codes for Utility Insecurity. That value set will be added to this group once it is available.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: <insert metadata> The value sets in this group represent the goals associated with Utility Insecurity as identified by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: Supports the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide for the exchange of goal.description.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT goals that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

contains.display: Able to afford electricity in residence (finding)
Able to afford cooling in residence (finding)
Able to afford utilities in residence (finding)
Able to afford heating in residence (finding)
